ssot__LoyaltyTier__dlm.name: Loyalty Tier
ssot__LoyaltyTier__dlm.description: The Loyalty Tier DMO represents a level in a loyalty program, where members receive better benefits as they move up the hierarchy.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.
